title: Kickasso
overview: Join artist and designer Kickasso in his LA studio where fashion, sports and Hip-Hop culture collide. Kickasso takes the sneaker game to the next level with elaborate, one of one designs for clients like rapper Young M.A, NBA champion Chris Bosh and model Sommer Ray. Experience the method to his madness as he digs into their personal lives to collaborate and design the most epic, custom one of a kind sneakers that truly express the passions of his collaborators.
